tool_description: Access the entirety of the Bible with our fast and free API, featuring all 66 books for quick and easy integration.
name: Bible Master Api
title: Bible Master Api

api_list.name: get_verse_by_book_chapter_and_verse_books__book_name__chapters__chapter_no__verses__verse_no__get
api_list.description:
Retrieve a specific verse from a book, chapter, and verse number.

Parameters:
- book_name (str): The name of the book.
- chapter_no (str): The chapter number.
- verse_no (str): The verse number.

Returns:
- dict: A dictionary containing the verse number and text.

Raises:
- HTTPException: If the chapter or verse numbers are not integers, or if the book, chapter, or verse is not found.

api_list.name: healthcheck_healthcheck_get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-master-api1.p.rapidapi.com/healthcheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-master-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: searchverses_search__get
api_list.description:
Search for verses in the Bible that contain the specified text.

Args:
    text (str): The text to search for in the verses.

Returns:
    list: A list of dictionaries representing the matching verses. Each dictionary contains the 'book' and 'chapters' fields.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If no verses are found containing the specified text.

api_list.name: get_chapters_by_book_books__book_name__chapters_get
api_list.description:
Retrieve chapters by book name.

Args:
    book_name (str): The name of the book.

Returns:
    list: A list of chapters for the specified book.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the book is not found.

api_list.name: get_verses_by_book_and_chapter_books__book_name__chapters__chapter_no__verses_get
api_list.description:
Retrieve the verses of a specific chapter in a book.

Parameters:
- book_name (str): The name of the book.
- chapter_no (str): The number of the chapter.

Returns:
- List[dict]: A list of dictionaries representing the verses in the specified chapter.

api_list.name: get_random_verse_verse_randomall_get
api_list.description:
Retrieves a random verse from the Bible dataset.

Returns:
    dict: A dictionary containing the randomly selected book, chapter, and verse.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-master-api1.p.rapidapi.com/verse/randomall"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-master-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List All Books
api_list.description:
Retrieves a list of all books in the Bible.

Returns:
    A list of all unique book names in the Bible.
    
Raises:
    HTTPException: If no books are found.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-master-api1.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-master-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
